name: cdk-arch-example
description: Example usage of cdk-arch with CDKTF deployment (Docker, Cloudflare)

scripts.deploy:cloudflare: PLATFORM=cloudflare npm run build:cloudflare && PLATFORM=cloudflare  CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN=$(npx wrangler auth token --json | jq -r .token) cdktf deploy --auto-approve
scripts.destroy:cloudflare: PLATFORM=cloudflare CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN=$(npx wrangler auth token --json | jq -r .token) cdktf destroy --auto-approve
